data: “Talk. Talk. Talk.... Good lines and no action... said all... not even promising first act... eighth failure and season more than half over... rather be a playwright and fail than a critic compelled to listen to has-beens and would-bes trying to put over bad plays.”
bestsellers, american, 1895-1923|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: romance|category: novels|category: american literature
